messages.content: What does the DTAIComfyVariables script provide for Comfy UI?
The DTAIComfyVariables script provides variable nodes and shared global variables for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
How does the DTAIComfyVariables script improve the user experience?
This script introduces quality of life improvements to the Comfy UI stable diffusion client.
How can the DTAIComfyVariables script be integrated into Comfy UI?
The DTAIComfyVariables script needs to be imported into the custom nodes directory of the Comfy UI client.
What is the licensing information for the DTAIComfyVariables script?
The DTAIComfyVariables script is licensed under the MIT License.
